Name: Star'Shoot
About the game: In this space shooter avenge the Earth destruction and destroy dozens of procedurally generated enemy waves ! Each death will make you stronger. Can you reach the top of the leaderboard ? In this game you will fight procedurally generated enemy waves which will evolve as you grow stronger ! Hopefully you can equip your ship with items and your score will allow you to unlock even more in the shop for next games ! -Arcade gameplay -An innovative death mechanics : Each time your ship explodes you will gain in strength and have a last chance to fight for your life ! -Beautiful pixel art -Ten boss fights -Play your own style with 3 different weapons and 40+ items
